document.forum_title: SAG Mart News - General, Entertainment, Mobile, Fashion, Health
document.discussion_title: Micromax Owned Yu Yunicorn Listed Yu Yureka S Smartphone On Official Website
document.topic_text: Micromax Owned Yu Yunicorn Listed Yu Yureka S Smartphone On Official Website 22nd, Aug 2016 11:20 AM View: 95 0 Yu Televentures , the Micromax owned company has discreetly reported Yu Yureka S smartphone in India. The latest smartphone is recorded on the organization's official website with a price tag of Rs 12,999 . This is a budget smartphone which includes a 5.2-inch display and has a full-HD panel with a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels with a pixel thickness of 423 ppi. The display comes secured with Corning Gorilla Glass 3. The gadget's overall construction is a mix of metal and polycarbonate. For the equipment, Yu Yureka S has been incorporated with the Qualcomm Snapdragon 615 quad-core processor clocked at 1.1GHz, combined with 3GB of RAM and Adreno 405 GPU. Users get 16GB internal memory. On the camera front, Yu Yureka S gets a 13-megapixel back camera with f/2.2 aperture and a 5-megapixel front camera with 84-degree wide-angle lens and f/2.2 aperture. Both the cameras can shoot 1080p recordings at 30fps. In addition, Yu Yureka S additionally comes stacked with Wolfson Pure Sound and Yamaha Amplifier which guarantees to convey an improved audio experience. Also Read: Yu Unveiled Yureka Note With 6-Inch Display For INR 14,999 The gadget runs Android 5.1.1 Lollipop with its AROUND YU skin on top. This UI gives a close-to-stock Android experience with a couple of helpful changes, making the general user experience a lot more fun. This is a double SIM smartphone and accompanies a Hybrid SIM card slot which takes either a double SIM setup or a SIM and microSD card combo. Fueling the Yu Yureka S is a conventional 3,000 mAh battery which guarantees to offer a standby time of up to 450 hours and talk-time of up to 9 hours. The gadget gets a small scale USB port for charging and data syncing, and bolsters QuickCharge 1.0 technology. This smartphone will take on Xiaomi's Redmi Note 3 , and the recently uncovered Lenovo K5 Note . Yu Yureka S arrives in a black color variation. The mobile handset isn't accessible for buy yet, however, considering the posting, we can anticipate that the mobile will be shipped soon. Must Visit Our Google+ Community Page For Latest And Updated Smartphone News Of The Globe.
